H0.text: The island called Martha's Vineyard off the south of Cape Cod in New England is in which state of the USA. New York

H1.text: The island called Martha's Vineyard off the south of Cape Cod in New England is in which state of the USA. Rhode Island

H2.text: The island called Martha's Vineyard off the south of Cape Cod in New England is in which state of the USA. Connecticut

H3.text: The island called Martha's Vineyard off the south of Cape Cod in New England is in which state of the USA. Mass.

A4.text: Martha's Vineyard is an island in the U.S. state of Massachusetts.

A5.text: Martha's Vineyard constitutes the bulk of Dukes County, Massachusetts.
